<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
    <title>Restaurant Kitchen</title>
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="style1.css">
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="utils.css">
</head>
<body class="overflow-hidden bg-color">
    <div class="container mx-auto">
        <header>
            <nav class="flex justify-between">
                <div class="logo text-font flex items-center text-color">Reastaurant
        
                <img src="data:image/png;base64," alt="" height="80px"  width="100px">
                 </div>
                 <ul class="navbar flex items-center">
                    <li class="color">Home</li>
                    <li class="color">Menu</li>
                    <li class="color">About</li> 
                    <li class="color">Contact Us</li> 
                    <li><button class="btn">Order now</button></li>                  
                </ul>
            </nav>
            <hr>
        </header>


        <main class="min-h-screen">
            <section class="section1">
                <div class="flex items-center ">
                <div class="topleft flex justify-center flex-col px-2">
                    <h1 class="my-1 section1-h1 color">One of the Finest Recipes</h1>
                    <p>Explore hundreds of top-rated quick and easy recipes for breakfast, lunch, and dinner.Keep it easy with these simple but delicious recipes. From make-ahead lunches and midweek meals to fuss-free sides and cakes.</p>
                </div>
                <div class="topright my-1">
                    <img src="https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1493770348161-369560ae357d?w=600&auto=format&fit=crop&q=60&ixlib=rb-4.0.3&ixid=M3wxMjA3fDB8MHxzZWFyY2h8MTl8fGZvb2R8ZW58MHx8MHx8fDA%3D" alt="" height="265px" width="455px" >

                </div>
                </div>
            </section>
            <hr>
            <section class="section2">
                <h1 class="text-center my-2 color">Subscription</h1>
                <p class="my-2">Check out the Subscription packages below. All the payment will be done online only via Razorpay.</p>
                <div class="boxes flex justify-center">
                    <div class="box">
                        <h2 class="color">Free</h2>
                        <ul>
                            <li class="highlighted">₹0</li>
                            <li>1 users included</li>
                            <li>Only short Recipes</li>
                            <li>ingredients</li>
                            <li>Only one access</li>
                            <li><button class="btn">Sign up for Free</button></li>
                        </ul>
                    </div>
                    <div class="box">
                        <h2 class="color">Pro</h2>
                        <ul>
                            <li class="highlighted">₹25/Month</li>
                            <li>2 users included</li>
                            <li>Selected Recipes</li>
                            <li>Detailed Ingredients</li>
                            <li>Anytime access</li>
                            <li><button class="btn">Sign up for now</button></li>
                        </ul>
                    </div>
                    <div class="box">
                        <h2 class="color">Enterprise</h2>
                        <ul>
                            <li class="highlighted">₹50/Month</li>
                            <li>3 users included</li>
                            <li>Any Recipes</li>
                            <li>Detailed Ingredients</li>
                            <li>Anytime access</li>
                            <li><button class="btn">Sign up now</button></li>
                        </ul>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </section>
            <hr>
            

        </main>
        <footer>
            Copyright &copy; Restaurant.com | All rights reserved
        </footer>
    </div>
</body>
</html>
